verbs.description: [ARG0: sabres] [V: lose] [ARG2: to rangers] [ARGM-TMP: 3 - 1] the sabres drop a 3 - 1 decision to the new york rangers sunday night at madison square garden in new york jimmy vesey jacaues plante nhl carter hutton national hockey league ap brendan smith rasmus dahlin vladislav namestnikov neal pionk nathan beaulieu ryan spooner rangers chris kreider new york adam mcquaid henrik lundqvist connor sheary rangers fc brett howden pavel buchnevich new york rangers sabres buffalo sabres mika zibanejad buffalo montreal
